basic.Peptide Name: M-zodatoxin-Lt2a (M-ZDTX-Lt2a; Latarcin-2a, Ltc-2a, Ltc2a; spiders, Arthropods, animals)
basic.Target Organism: [Ref.16735513]Gram-positive bacteria:Arthrobacter globiformis VKM Ac-1112 (MIC=0.7 µM), Bacillus subtilis VKM B-501 (MIC=0.4 µM);Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli DH5-alpha (MIC=1.0 µM), Escherichia coli MH1 (MIC=0.7 µM), Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1 (MIC=6.7 µM);Fungi:Pichia pastoris GS115 (MIC=6.7 µM), Saccharomyces cerevisiae Y190 (MIC=54 µM).
